attributes.action: only allow people to vote after having acheived a set standard in a national IQ test.
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: Many people with a low IQ are unable to fully grasp the complexities of politics. It therefore seems appropriate to limit voting to those with the necessary capacity to understand the issues concerned.

reasons: Language which is offensive, intemperate, or provocative
